backend/main.mo: Defines data models and query methods for games, items, categories, and update statuses, storing crafting and catalog game data and exposing retrieval/search functions.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and tests for deployment verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of major frontend components, hooks, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx with the production title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global layout, theme provider, and triggers production preflight checks.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable component showing a fallback message when no data or search results are found.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying copyright, branding, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header with app logo, title, and a home-navigation button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors with query invalidation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider enabling login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductionPrefligh: Runs initial non-blocking backend connectivity checks for various actor methods and logs diagnostic results.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching games, catalog data, items, and statuses from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with a paper-textured aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/GameDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed info for a selected game, including items, categories, search, and crafting status.
frontend/src/pages/GameSearchPage.tsx: Shows a searchable catalog of games with loading states, error handling, and a hero banner.
frontend/src/pages/ItemDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific item, including category, materials, and stats with navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color system, fonts, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines project state metadata, existing features, pending feature requests, and notes for a draft-to-production deployment workflow.
